venue.name: The Alchemy Juice Bar & Growing Green Co-op

item.description:
Hip Hop yoga offers a celebratory twist by featuring music of the hip-hop and pop worlds. The result is an East meets West yoga style thatâ€™s athletically fulfilling and spiritually soothing. This class will encompasses flowing yoga music to give you a life-altering experience.

Hip Hop Zumba is a style of dance-aerobics workout with pulsating Hip Hop music. This will class incorporates footwork and body movements from contemporary dances. Participants will move to beats that will leave them invigorated.

Yoga is from 6:00 pm-7:00 pm
Zumba is from 7:00pm- 8:00pm
A $5 donation is requested to help support the co-op. No one turned away for lack of funds.

Come for one or stay for both! It's sure to be a flowing and fulfilling evening.
item.name: Hip Hop Yoga and Zumba
